title: Blended Learning-Based Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program for Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: In-service engineering practitioners conducting engineering problem-solving projects within a language education context.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more expert-level problem-solving processes by analyzing real-world energy audit cases.
Learners can execute team-based projects in blended learning environments using digital tools.
Learners design problem-solving tasks based on constructivist learning models and achieve at least 80% proficiency according to assessment criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
